dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4171 IH: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the authority to conduct telework travel expenses test programs, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gianforte (for himself and Mr. Connolly) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the authority to conduct telework travel expenses test programs, and for other purposes.

section.header: Extension of authority to conduct telework travel expenses test programs
section.text: Section 5711(g) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by striking 7 years after the date of the enactment of the Telework Enhancement Act of 2010 and inserting on December 31, 2020.
